website_summaries.verdict: It's pricey, but this innovative swiveling booster seat will comfortably see your little one through every meal time, from infancy to toddlerhood.
pros: Accommodates each stage of growth with recline capabilities and seating options for infants, older babies, and toddlers
Unique swivel feature allows the seat to rotate
Plush padding and a soft cover provide superior comfort
The dishwasher-safe feeding tray and machine washable cover make for fuss-free cleaning
cons: Center harness strap isn't removable for cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: The chair is ok, the swivel is good, portability is good. The underside of the tray scratches up my babies knees, it is hard plastic with thin ribs. I could not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Glad I chose this seat!
customer_reviews.text: I was considering getting a cheaper booster seat but I'm glad I chose this one! I didn't have any issues with the booster scratching or bruising her leg. This was one of the things that almost kept me from purchasing the seat. Fortunately, there is more than enough room for her legs as you can see in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jesusdied4u

customer_reviews.title: Scratches my baby's legs!
customer_reviews.text: Looks cute with a major design flaw- when you slide the tray on, the plastic on the bottom of the tray hangs down so low that my baby gets her knees scratched (and she's petite for her age 25th percentile). Every time she moves her legs or kicks from excitement she gets scratched and screams/cries from pain. Will be returning!!
customer_reviews.author: MomOfTwoLittles

customer_reviews.title: Love this chick
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. We are so limited on space in our small house this was an excellent option for us. I did read reviews about the knees being scraped of the littles. Yes this was a bad design fail. However it easily fixed. We adhered foam to the bottom or the tray that still allows for the movement of the latches but covered the readied parts. Problem solved :). Other than that it’s wonderful! It’s sturdy. Secures nicely to a chair. Reclines and grows with the child. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Mulilis

customer_reviews.title: I can eat dinner again!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 2 months old, so not ready to start solids, but I ordered this high chair anyways. Best decision ever! Baby used to get really fussy around dinnertime, making it difficult for me to eat at the same time as everyone else. Well, baby loves this high chair! The newborn padding makes it super snug and comfy. The tilt feature puts him at just the right angle. He loves being right next to everyone at the dinner table! Definitely worth the purchase, and I haven't even gotten to its intended purpose yet!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Buchmiller

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to a tall high chair. My baby managed to climb out of her tall chair and fell, so we switched to this one, which we can be secured to a chair if we are at the table, or placed on the floor if we aren't. We use it without the fabric cushion because the baby really doesn't care and we can sanitize it after every meal without having to throw the cover in the wash. It is also great because we can easily bring it with us if we are planning to have dinner at someone else's house!
customer_reviews.author: jayhawker

customer_reviews.title: Kid will not slide around in this one
customer_reviews.text: We tried another seat that was made of a non-cusioned plastic and our daughter was sliding all over the place. We really like the Graco Swivi Seat because of the cushion that is 1) much more comfortable, and 2) no sliding around. It's basically similar to a comfortable car seat. Clipping the child in-and-out is very easy as well. Cleaning I gave a slightly lower score because the table cover is pretty big and it would be hard or not even worth putting in the dishwasher, and we haven't reached the point of washing the cushion but I'm assuming it would be more difficult than just having plastic (a trade- off we're more than willing to accept).
customer_reviews.author: Todd W.

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of leg room for chunky thighs
customer_reviews.text: Wish we had bought this sooner! My 7 month old is comfortable and content in this chair. She has very chunky legs and has about 2 inches of space between the tray and her legs. She likes to sit in it while I am working in the kitchen so she can be a part of the action as well. We haven't needed the tilt or swivel functions, but we have tried them and they are smooth and easy to transition.
customer_reviews.author: theofficefan

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for us.
customer_reviews.text: Very good investment. I am a person who does lots of research before buying any baby product. So I checked all the baby products for something I can use for long run as well as I can use my dinning chair to fit it so that I don’t have to put one of my dining chair away to fit my baby chair. And guess what this is just the perfect. So easy to clean. And very nice product. Baby sliding or puking, u got it. It is very very helpful. Very very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Priya

customer_reviews.title: Great for our daughter with Muscular Dystrophy!
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying we searched far and wide for a good high chair that had support and was easy to transport between grandmas house and home. Our sweet girl has Muscular dystrophy so a chair that had support and reclined was a must and this is perfect! For anyone with a kid who has muscle tone issues or can’t hold themselves up very well this chair is perfection! I cannot day enough good things about how much we like this chair. Thanks for a great product Graco and Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Kindra

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Highchair. Happy I bought it!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am happy with this high chair. It has definitely been the best fit for my household, there is not a lot of room in the dining nook. I have a dedicated chair for this, and I can store the tray behind the tray when not in use. My son definitely needs the 5 point harness which is easy to buckle them in with. It is very easy to remove the cover and toss in in the wash. The only downside is that it doesn't click together easily. I have to giggle the tray around a bit before I feel like it has a good lock. I still think it's worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marvelous MelissaTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Starp for bottom and another for the back of chair
customer_reviews.text: We are liking the chair I like that the tray dont slid on it clips on so I dont have worry bout her knees so much and then it just lifts right off when done love the 360 turning pretty handy and the harness it's the only thing that keeps my little Houdini in. Altho I'm in sire why ppl make high chairs with white straps I might dye them darker but that's just my opinion white shows everything.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this seat! By far, this is her favorite thing to sit in. She has reflux and it puts her at a better angle than my bouncer, and definitely the car seat. The swivel feature is nice too because there is less fuss when you move around. We haven't even started to use it as a high chair yet, since she's not on solids yet, but we've certainly gotten our money out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Steph46121

customer_reviews.title: the sharp of the back make baby toe crashed
customer_reviews.text: when baby site on it the foot will kick the back of the table, and there is a sharp in the back will injured baby toe. very bad design.never use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent seat for a newborn through toddlerhood
customer_reviews.text: We loved this seat. We were able to seat our newborn at the dinner table with us with this seat (tilted back) so she could be at the table with us when she was awake and we use the seat with our toddler also. Everything comes off for cleaning except the crotch strap (which is silly...it's dirty!). We actually lost straps and contacted Graco to reorder and they have shoulder and waist straps that fit this seat, item # 1936249.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I have had 2 of these for a year now and decided to give my review. They are wonderful chairs... until your child has an accident or spills liquid. The liquid collects in the bottom and you will wonder for weeks where this smell comes from. The second you take this seat out of the chair its obvious because the collected liquid pours all over you and the floor. The only way to clean the inside is to take ot apart. I dont know how to clean the middle crotch buckle. I guess you have to take it completely apart for that too.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: It is so easy now to have my 3 months old baby join the rest of the family during meal time. It's easy to feed her when she is sitting in the chair. We will feed her first then let her watch the rest us eat. We can recline the seat so she sits there more comfortably. We haven't tried the tray yet. The chair is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Lei B.

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR CHUBBY BABIES
customer_reviews.text: Regretted my purchase.Not A good chair for chubbier babies. My son is almost 4 months old and wears 9month old clothing. When putting him in the chair the tray wasn’t able to latch to the chair because of his belly being in the way. Super tight on baby bellies.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria

customer_reviews.title: High Quality,  Great Buy! Scrap the bad reviews!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant in buying because of some of the reviews and how bad it sounded. Graco has always been a baby lover in terms of the quality stuff that they make and because I know this for a fact I bought it. It's an absolutely amazing chair, I got it for my son at 6 months old. He's now 9 months and he fits perfectly in it. My only issue is he loves to move about and he prefers to crawl around when he's being fed. Hopefully when ge gets a little older he sit like a nice little boy and have his meals...lol.
customer_reviews.author: Joan J.

customer_reviews.title: NOT easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I've had this high chair for 2 years now. I love everything about it EXCEPT you cannot completely take it apart to clean. There's an area between the base and seat that catches food and drinks that I can't get to in order to clean. The chair now smells terrible because of this.
customer_reviews.author: MrsTrenerry

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom for when I take my baby over to her house and I’m seriously planning on purchasing another one for my home. It doesn’t take up a lot of space. The baby looks really comfortable on it, it is easy to clean and once she grows up we are able to make it a toddlers seat. What else can you ask for? Super convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Perla

customer_reviews.title: The pattern is really cute (color as shown in picture) and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece and my sister loves it. The pattern is really cute (color as shown in picture) and is easy to clean. It's very secure and baby feels safe sitting int his on a chair. It's portable and you can take it to a friend's house, restaurant, etc (just need space in your car). The table top is easy to use- the part you squeeze on the under side has an option so you can click it in with one hand or two, which is great for parents because you never have two hands for anything! Straps click in easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Nice portable high chair.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE this baby chair, bought for my granddaughter, she sits very well in it,love the fact it reclines, she has often fell asleep in it,I just recline it all the way back. Also like that it swivels right and left. It secures very well to kitchen chair, it will stay on chair until she out grows it.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It’s for my grandson there is just no need for the old school high chair anymore. This goes into a cradle position which is AWESOME sit up straight position and it swivels to right or left Takes no room whatsoever. It’s very sturdy very well made super easy to clean. Highly highly recommend it for grandparents home or if you live in an apartment with limited room this is the one you want.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Gertz

customer_reviews.title: Great for Developmental Delays
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this product! We got this booster chair when my daughter was about 9 months old. She has developmental delays, so does not have perfect head control and does not sit on her own. I was looking for something that would give her the support she needed to stay upright while eating. The padded insert is awesome for head control, and the seat design with the plastic hump makes it so that she can't start sliding down underneath the tray. I thought I would use the recline features more, but the design gives her enough support while she is upright that I rarely use it. This was an awesome buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great Space Saver
customer_reviews.text: As a young couple, we’re currently living in a very small apartment. This booster seat saves a lot of room. We’re not using the dining chair, and we just put this booster seat on the floor. This thing is super sturdy. My son is 6 months old and he tosses and turns a lot. But this seat doesn’t budge. Overall I can’t be happier. Graco never fails me.
customer_reviews.author: Leilabird

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair. We got rid of our stand alone chair after running out of dining room space. It looks great and doesn’t stand out with our dining set. It’s easy to clean and fits perfectly on our counter height dining room chairs. It’s my most favorite after having many high chairs with 3 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a feeding chair 2 years ago for our newborn daughter then. Have been using it since. Now bought a 2nd one for our 7 months old son. It's easy to put together and to clean it off. We don't use the padding since the chair gets messy and it's easier to just wipe it off then to wash the padding all the time. We use it for feedings and arts and crafts too. I'd recommend this product to anyone looking for a feeding chair for their little one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tray hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: This booster seat is very sturdy and well built however I had a hard time putting on the tray with baby already strapped in. There wasn’t enough room between the tray and seat for baby’s chunky thighs. I also couldn’t keep his fingers away from the spots where the tray slide in so after finagling for 15 minutes with the tray I gave up and returned it. I would have kept the seat had the tray been easier to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Trace

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Baby doesn’t mind sitting in it, feels safe but it’s a bit wiggly when you use the swivel option. It’s very cute but we don’t use the tray often because it’s a little tight and baby is not very chunky.
customer_reviews.author: Myself

customer_reviews.title: Space saver
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate not having a separate chair in my dining room when I watch my grandkids. The swivel feature is great for allowing adults on either side feed with a quick button push and turning the seat. No need to rearrange everyone to allow the legs of a high-chair to be positioned among the other chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great space saving high chair
customer_reviews.text: This high chair is affordable, saves space, and very practical. We started using it at 5 months with the extra cushions provided. Around 7 months we took off the extra cushions. I love the removable tray for easy washing, easy to clean and cute fabric and it is easy to remove the cover of you need to do more than spot clean. Baby is very secure with the optional shoulder straps. I don't see any reason to buy a full high chair rather than a strap on seat like this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Overall, great!
customer_reviews.text: I would say I "love it", but the seat material is a fabric. Yes, it is washable, but not necessarily "wipe-able" like a vinyl seat. The tray is an easy on/off with one hand pull in the front. It easily slides into a recline with one hand. The swivel option is nice, but I only use it so it fits on the chair better. Overall, an excellent product and a great buy!! I just wish the seat material was a vinyl so it was wipe-able.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: So far, my baby loves this seat. He's only 3 months, and the reclined position is great. He can be up high with us and we can sit and have a meal together once in a while. My baby doesn't like his bouncy seat, but we needed a place to set him down occasionally. It's a big relief when I need to make something in the kitchen. This might be TMI, but the more upright position (as opposed to being on his back all the time) seems to help his digestion (gas, poo)! I haven't used the tray or the swivel feature yet, but so far we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: k8simply

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly, stays together
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this after I returned another booster high chair. This design is great. My grandchildren are happy when they sit in it, I feel they are safe, easy assembly and the parts stay put together. Will get lots of usage out of it over the years. I do suggest putting a towel or purchasing the chair pad with this to keep chair from getting dirty or scratched.
customer_reviews.author: Freda Wright

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t fit very well on our chair. The tray sucks because it doesn’t click into place very well so it falls the second my baby moves. If we hadn’t purchased this so far in advance (baby shower money) before we used it we would have returned it for something different.
customer_reviews.author: LaSharra Cahoon

customer_reviews.title: Great high chair seat
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this high chair seat! My 7 month old has some developmental delays making it difficult for him to sit up on his own and the extra cushioning gives him the support that he needs to sit up in the chair. You can tell that he feels so cool and grown up and happy when he gets to sit in his big boy chair! I also like that the tray is nice and big. The seat is easy to recline and to swivel.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff D

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this to any parent!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about a month now. It was easy to assemble and place on the chair. The white tray cover is great if lunch makes a mess, you still have the grey tray for dinner! It has been easy to wipe off and clean after meals, the white tray cover fits nicely in my dishwasher and the fabric cover has held up fine in the washing machine. My son fits securely in the seat and the tilting ability is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: love the adjustability of the chair
customer_reviews.text: love the adjustability of the chair. My daughter loves sitting in it and watching me while i'm in the kitchen. It feel soft and comfortabe for her and the straps make it very secure. There is PLENTY of strap for larger chairs. I had like 2 feet of strap left over. I just tied it into a knot under the chair.
customer_reviews.author: Bepperson30

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: The five point harness is great but after using daily for six months they are starting to wear out and not seem as securely snapped together other than that it’s been great! Compact and easy to bring to grandmas house for a visit. Attaches well to typical kitchen chair and the three position feature was awesome when baby was first learning to sit and still needing to be reclined
customer_reviews.author: elvia Yvette wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! It's easy to put together and is very stable. The inclined position is perfect for my newborn at meal times and allows the family to enjoy a meal togehter. The reason I'm not giving 5 stars is because underneath the tray table has a lot of plastic parts that are potentially sharp and could hurt should kids kick and scrape their knees.
customer_reviews.author: william david schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Good for infant but bottom strap is hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this chair when our baby was just 3 months old. We liked it because when our baby was still little he can sit with us during meal time. My only complain for this chair is the bottom strap is very hard to clean. You can’t remove it, so itmakes difficult for us to clean it.
customer_reviews.author: Sean bostick

customer_reviews.title: The best high chair ever!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best high hair/toddler booster around! We let a friend borrow our first one and felt so bad asking for it back when we got pregnant again that we bought a new one so their child could grow with it like our son did. So convenient and safe and best of all, the retractable and detachable seat back allows you to use it from birth to big boy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and very comfy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 months old son that just wants to sit and watch everyone. With this chair, he can sit very comfortably and watch everyone and everything around him. I was also able to rotate the chair/view for him easily as well as rock him back for feeding. So far he’s loving this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Good for our little one!
customer_reviews.text: We love this seat! Our little one is 7 mos old, so I can't really review it as a booster seat yet. She can use it with or without the insert. Pros: doesn't take up extra floor space, easy to take the cover off to wash, easy to attach to the chair, 5 pt harness or just lap belt, removable tray insert to make cleanup easier, most straps easy to remove to be washed Cons: the only con so far is that the strap between the legs can't be removed
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Scratched Knees, but still a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed except the tray. Our grandson's knees were scratched by the underside of the tray, not terribly, but still scratched. Graco needs to find a way to remold the plastic form of the tray beneath, or find a way to cushion it for babies' knees and legs. If not for this, I would have given it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy at GRET price.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to spend alot of money on a good product for my grand-daughter because I knew I wouldn't really use it alot. She doesn't live with me. This is PERFECT chair. Study and priced much better than expected for such a a high quality pproduct!
customer_reviews.author: JeRenia F.

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient, wish I would’ve bought sooner
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an open box, but you most certainly couldn’t tell! I would buy it at full price too though, that’s how much I love this seat! It’s very cute, gender neutral, cover comes off easily for cleaning, cleans up beautifully. I love the swivel and recline features. Sometimes my babe falls asleep after lunch and I don’t even have to bother her to get up, I just press in the button and she reclines. I use mine on the floor, but it would be nice for small babies at the dinner table as well!
customer_reviews.author: KeiannaP

customer_reviews.title: Use with bench
customer_reviews.text: Perfect solution for our dining benches. Our 4 mo hangs out in it while we are cooking dinner, packing lunches, etc. I love that it reclined and swivels, giving it much more use when we're in different areas of the house (we can turn him).
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great price and super easy to install. My 4 months old crazy to join us on the table so it’s a very great idea since we have an old office big chair so we put it there and she looks as a manager 🤪
customer_reviews.author: Jorge & Brenda

customer_reviews.title: amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat / highchair for our little one...she always wants to be in the middle of everything with everybody and this seat makes it possible! We started using this chair when she was 15 weeks old, it is perfect. Gives her hold and all!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Awesome high chair for kitchen dwellers!
customer_reviews.text: Best baby purchase we have made, wish we had bought it earlier on! We spend hours in the kitchen and this has made it so much easier to do, you always know where the baby is. The swivel feature works very well and doesn’t get caught, is very smooth. Reclining feature is wonderful, really useful when the baby is tired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very useful. We already have 8 chairs to our table ...
customer_reviews.text: Very useful. We already have 8 chairs to our table so I wanted a high chair that would attach to one of our chairs. It looks nice and I love how it reclines and turns. Also, the insert or extra padding is great since my daughter is only 4 months old. We aren't using the high chair for feedings yet but more so she can sit with us at the table while we eat.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Efficient mini highchair
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for apartment dwellers or people with limited space. Fastens easily and the large tray is great for children learning to eat different foods.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his first Christmas. We assembled it in minutes and fits great on both the counter stools and dining chairs. We're still not feeding him solids as he's only just turned 4 months but he's very comfortable in it when I set him up to watch me clean the kitchen or eat at the table when he's awake.
customer_reviews.author: Salina Day

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Did everything as advertised. Was steadier than I thought strapped to a small office chair. Doesn't take up as much space as a full high chair when not being used. Good price too.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this highchair! Returned one that sat on the floor because it took up too much room in our kitchen. This one is perfect, the straps are long enough to fit around our wide chairs. The tray clicks and locks into place. The seat has a piece between the legs that keeps my son from jumping out of the seat once I unstrap him. The fabric is very easy to clean on the seat. I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Niemann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The tray is a bit bulky and our daughter doesn't like to sit with the tray on as she likes to pull her feet up but the adjustment feature to recline or sit up is perfect for her! She is preemie who is now 14 lbs and it helps her sit up properly and also lie back for a bottle after purées.
customer_reviews.author: M. Moore

customer_reviews.title: One for home and one for Grandma's
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Swivi seat. I received the first one for a baby shower after a friend recommended it instead of a highchair. We use it all the time and purchased one for Grandma's house too. We've been using this pretty much from birth and it's great to have the baby sitting at the table during meals. We also use it as a landing place for her when cooking dinner. She likes to see what's going on and we can keep an eye on her while she plays.
customer_reviews.author: sarcastchick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small high chair
customer_reviews.text: Perfect high chair for us. We have a small house so having a high chair that I could just strap in a chair was a must. The tray goes on and off easily and I love that I can rotate it without having to turn the whole chair.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product but it has too much material and you have to keep baby really clean bc you would have to wash after every use. The material/fabric does get stain if you forget to wipe off baby food such as carrots and sweet potato. I kept it bc it’s really comfortable, and wanted to give it another try in a few months
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product for any size and any age baby
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for any size and any age baby. The chair tilts back in case the baby is too small to sit up or hold his head up. It also has an insert made to brace a younger infant. The chair also swivels 180 degrees to turn your baby to you without moving the whole chair. Since we did not need our 4th chair this was a great space saver because it just straps tightly to the chair. The table top is easily removable and adjustable for your baby to row.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler A. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best items a family of a new infant can purchase. It is comfortable for the child, is adjustable, and its use will go on for years. The highlight of the tray are the protruding edges that keep spilled milk, food, and other mishaps from making it to the floor, a big disappointment for the family dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer Bill

customer_reviews.title: Space saver!
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t like clutter like me. Then get this chair! We had one of the big bulky ones and it took up so much space! This one is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Dibbern

customer_reviews.title: We use daily, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this seat! We use it every day. It's very sturdy and easy to clean. It swivels nicely and is very easy to use. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased the book highchair for my parents house as an extra highchair, it was awful. This was affordable and quality. Comfortable for my son who is a big 9 month old.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for newborn
customer_reviews.text: Solid base, my family jokes that it’s like Dr Evil’s chair in Austin Powers since it swivels so easily. This is a great chair for my 2-month old son to join us in the kitchen while we are cooking and cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Another great Graco product
customer_reviews.text: This has been so convenient. Infant to toddler. The only con I have is there seems to be no replacement covers available.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary & Jaclyn Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: I love how you can adjust it
customer_reviews.text: My son is big (chubby) and i thought he wasnt going to fit but he did! Which is a big win for me. I have a daughter who is 2 yrs old and i got this one because i knew she was going to be jealous of that chair and she fits perfectly too! I love how you can adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I will say that the leaning back capability doesn’t work very well when it’s atached to a chair. The back of the chair gets in the way. But my child is old enough that I don’t need that function so it’s not as a big deal to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chorrace

customer_reviews.title: Great highchair
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this highchair! It levels easily, I can take the tray off one handed, the buckle is very secure, and it reclines really far which is nice for newborns or for babies fall asleep in the chair. My only complaint would be with my table I cannot push the chair all the way in, so it does stick out. Other than that it is a very nice highchair and I've been happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Malekow

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: This seat has been WONDERFUL for our son. He has low tone so we use it to help strengthen his core muscles and also do his sensory activities on the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Creed M.

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair! It is very secure and easily straps onto a kitchen chair just fine. The removable tray is nice and easy to wash. My 10 month old still fits great, I just took out the infant insert and he is totally comfy and can use this probably for another year or so.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn L.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: Love it, perfect for my small dine in kitchen. So comfortable my baby naps in it. Sturdy, when strapped in. I like that it swivels, I’m glad I paid more for that feature I turn the seat in different directions and I don’t have to move my heavy chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lemon Evers

customer_reviews.title: Best decision ever
customer_reviews.text: I order two of these about a month ago for my two youngest(baby and 1 year old). It is amazing, love how I can lean it back (for my baby who can’t sit up yet) and move it side to side or in any position with one hand. Very easy to setup, and clean. Also love that I no longer have my kids crying b/c they don’t want to be in a hard high chair. With these after they are done eating they just sit there and wait until I am done. I definitely recommend every parent to buy this. My only regret is not doing it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Holly-George Pinkston

customer_reviews.title: Easily Cleanable
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. The straps come off and can be put in the wash. All food and craft paint has come out easily!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kendall

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: Great. Straps into most chairs. Table clips in and out easily. Straps are easy to adjust. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lunch

customer_reviews.title: Handy high chair
customer_reviews.text: The Swivi seat is well built and very convenient. I bought it to use for my 1 year old daughter over the holidays for dinners with relatives. The swiveling feature made it easy to keep her occupied. I could easily rotate her to face her mother or myself.
customer_reviews.author: James Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great except the underside of the tray
customer_reviews.text: Would have given this 5 stars if it wasn't for the underside of the tray. First off, this is very easy to put together, it's portable, takes up less space compared to a traditional high chair, and our baby fits comfortably in there. But the underside of the tray is rough and will scratch your baby, so be aware and careful when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Arceo

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little high chair! It's compact, easy to assemble, and entirely washable. I love that I can lean it back to accommodate my small infant now but will be able to use it for years as it transitions into a booster seat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and safe
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 month old and my son really likes it. Happy to say that it is sturdy and does not budge. Really like that I can incline the seat or rotate it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon costumer EA

customer_reviews.title: Baby is very secure and fits well
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical to get this for my baby... my sons doctor kept recommending it but I already had a highchair.. Finally I gave in and got it... my son loves it.. he is able to get comfortable quickly.. he can reach the tray pretty well.. I don’t really think there’s anything I don’t like about it.. I would definitely recommend this instead of a big high chair..
customer_reviews.author: Karma422

customer_reviews.title: Is perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have issues with the tray and the knees of my baby are big!! he love to eat in his seat! My baby have 6month and his weight is 20pounds and he is 2”9.
customer_reviews.author: Kayshla Machuca

customer_reviews.title: It takes an open bottom chair or it to sit properly on the seat.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing that I don’t e like about this product. The downside is the chair that I had to buy. The bottom of the back of the chair needs to be open so the base fits on the seat of the chair. I bought a nice chair at a thrift store and painted it then gave it an antique glaze with polyurethane on top. It turned out real nice.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Lincoln

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! I have benches around my table instead of chairs and the side to side rotation makes it so much easier to sit beside the baby and feed her. The up and down allows her to be more comfortable. In my only con is that I didn't have this with my first child.
customer_reviews.author: Merri Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Space-saver
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to a high chair and can later be converted into a booster. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Chris & Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great spill proof material
customer_reviews.text: Great spill proof material. Swivel feature is nice for feeding and not having to strain your back. Also great for snacking and movie watching set up on couch. Cons: tray is really tricky to get on, each and every time, compared to other seats..also wish it reclined so I could put baby in it easier.
customer_reviews.author: Oranges_R_delicious

customer_reviews.title: One of the best in the market
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and use. I use it at my son's grandparent's house during our summer stay. He loves it. It's one of the best poratble highchair in. the market.
customer_reviews.author: Firdous Kamal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my grandson and my daughter loves how sturdy it is and easy to clean. Great product :)
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Vega

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to clean and it’s 3 in 1.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great booster. My granddaughter is safe. It grows with your baby. Very easy to clean. The top tray is removable and I just hand wash it. I love it. I will be ordering another for my new grandson.
customer_reviews.author: Lorena

customer_reviews.title: Swivel feature is surprisingly helpful!
customer_reviews.text: Like the swiveling feature. Cleans easy. Easy to get the tray on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love the seat the cover would have been nicer in a more neutral style but I still love the chair it’s very convenient and lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's not terrible, but does detract from the product
customer_reviews.text: Works well. We got it because it matches the pattern for our pack n play and swing. Unfortunately, she does bump her knees on the underside of the tray (as other reviews mentioned). It's not terrible, but does detract from the product.
customer_reviews.author: EGEndeavors

customer_reviews.title: Best option out there
customer_reviews.text: Great option if you don’t want to buy a bulky high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: this is perfect! It is easily detachable so sometimes when we ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have a tight kitchen, this is perfect! It is easily detachable so sometimes when we have dinner we bring the baby to the table, sometimes we take it outside. It is very versatile, as you can adjust any angle the baby likes. Leaned back, she sits there to just hang out with us and be part of the "action" more elevated than a bouncer would allow. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Remy Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Can sit at table with family!
customer_reviews.text: Can recline for bottle feedings. Chair takes up less space than a stand alone high chair. Baby can sit at table with family. Top tray comes off for easy washing. Dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Love this seat!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this seat for our 3rd child. We’ve had many seats in our years with littles, and this is by far the best. I did not realize how much I would appreciate the swivel and reclining features! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for babies to grow with!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a first time momma! She loves it! The 5 wk old loves it! Reclines for newborn and it is up at adult.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smith

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Item
customer_reviews.text: Love this high chair, the tilt and twist is a great feature, the fabric is machine washable, we use it in our motor home also since it does not take up a lot of room, a great item all around.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: (Edited, reduced to 3 stars) This seat is super handy. My 10 week old can join me in the kitchen while I make dinner and join us at the table. We have a small house, so not having an extra piece of large furniture to deal with is great. My lo is now 11 months old. The fabric of the seat gets stained with pretty much every meal, and while the side straps can come out to be cleaned, the middle strap cannot. We still like the seat and it works, but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Joy V.

product_meta.title: Graco Swivi Seat 3-in-1 Booster High Chair, Abbington
product_meta.description: Color:AbbingtonWhen it comes to staying connected to baby, the Graco SwiviSeat Booster Chair is the perfect choice. The smart swivel seat design rotates so you can turn your child to face any direction - facing mom, dad or facing the table for family interaction - giving you bonding from the start. This revolutionary booster high chair truly grows with your child and easily attaches to your dining chair, adapting for infant to baby to toddler (up to 50 lbs.). It's the only booster with true infant cradle recline, for baby's early involvement into family meals - and allowing both parents to be involved in baby's feedings.
feature_bullets: Booster high chair is designed to grow with your child from infant feedings to table toddler booster meals
The unique swiveling toddler booster seat rotates, conveniently positioning baby for mealtimes and for bonding interaction with the whole family
The only baby high chair featuring true infant cradle recline design, for baby's earliest feedings
Infant recline cradles baby perfectly for early feedings or as an early seat right at the table with the rest of the family
Plush head and body support keeps baby comfy for early feedings and removes as your growing child needs more room

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars798 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars

specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
